Constructor for QgsPalettedRasterRenderer.

memberdef.argsstring: (int bandNo, const QgsRectangle &extent, int width, int height, QgsRasterBlockFeedback *feedback=nullptr) override
memberdef.name: block

briefdescription.para: Read block of data using given extent and size.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns pointer to data. Caller is responsible to free the memory returned.
bandNo
band number
extent
extent of block
width
pixel width of block
height
pixel height of block
feedback
optional raster feedback object for cancelation/preview. Added in QGIS 3.0.

briefdescription.para: Gets the source color ramp.

Opens a color table file and returns corresponding paletted renderer class data.

detaileddescription.para:
An optional color ramp can be specified to automatically assign colors from the ramp.

briefdescription.para: Converts a string containing a color table or class data to to paletted renderer class data.
Converts classes to a string representation, using the .clr/gdal color table file format.
